description.name: polerc20
description.tagline: POL erc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto erc20-pol Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept POL erc20 directly on your website
Unique erc20/pol receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your erc20/pol wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
